Pre-Game Insights: Rahul Tripathi and Ruturaj Gaikwad are likely to be considered for selection in place of Sanju Samson, who is ruled out due to injury.
Hardik Pandya and coach Rahul Dravid will not look to make further changes to their batting line-up, despite opener Shubman Gill having a forgettable debut at Wankhede.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India and Sri Lanka have both won one game each at the MCA Stadium in Gahunje.
The Pune batter Ruturaj Gaikwad will have to play at No. 3 or later if he gets to play on Thursday.
Others: Jitesh Sharma has been called as Sanju Samson's replacement and will join the team in Pune.
Vidarbha wicketkeeper-batter Jitesh Sharma has been called as Samson's replacement and will join the team in Pune.
